version_description:
There is a massive Texas Casino update waiting for you.

You asked, we delivered:

* Now you will be able to participate in several Club events running at the same time!
* Players' avatars are even more exciting! Now you can show off your C
Slots and Casino fans! We have brand new Texas Casino update waiting for you.
World's #1 casino keeps getting better! Get the latest Billionaire Casino update and check it out.

We have brand new Billionaire Casino update waiting for you. This update includes:

- Interface improvements
- Possibility to pass leadership to Club co-leaders
- Russian language support
- Turkish language support
- ES-America support

Hi Guys!
We're very glad to bring you a brand new update. In this update, we've fixed some nagging bugs to make sure your experience is truly Huuuge!
That's all for this time! As always #StayHuuuge and #PlayTogether!
